amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into any contract with an incorporated entity if such entity's sealed bid or competitive proposal shows that such entity is incorporated or chartered in Bermuda or the Cayman Islands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into any contract with an incorporated entity if such entity's sealed bid or competitive proposal shows that such entity is incorporated or chartered in Bermuda or the Cayman Islands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 200 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 200 (Roll no. 387).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
